strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to play audio in a Google Desktop Gadget
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT:
Audio Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget uses the audio framework to play an MP3 file. You can control the playback using the text control.
Contains work created by Michael Renkama: http://www.opsound.org/artist/michaelrenkema/ Made available under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/
